The sum which the Board of Education expects to use for
television equipment does not represent the engire pro-
posed expenditure. For example, it does not include
building of studios, since there is suitable space in
an existing building that can be remodled as a part of
a general building program. It does not include cerÂ¬
tain overhead, such as staff, and lights, heat, etc.
It does not include some of the equipment and supplies
and other things which will be used in common by the
present FM radio station, and the proposed TV operation.
